summary.span: 将标记字符和文本写入 ASP.NET 服务器控件输出流。

span.span: Writes markup characters and text to an ASP.NET server control output stream.

summary.span: 此类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在向客户端呈现标记时使用的格式化功能。

span.span: This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering markup to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于呈现到桌面浏览器的 HTML 4.0。The class is used to render HTML 4.0 to desktop browsers. 中的所有标记写入程序也都是基类命名空间，包括， ，和类。The is also the base class for all markup writers in the namespace, including the , , and classes. 这些类用于写入元素、 属性和不同类型的标记的样式和布局信息。These classes are used to write the elements, attributes, and style and layout information for different types of markup. 此外，通过与每个标记语言关联的页和控件适配器类使用这些类。In addition, these classes are used by the page and control adapter classes that are associated with each markup language. 在大多数情况下，ASP.NET 自动使用的合适的编写器发出请求的设备。In most circumstances, ASP.NET automatically uses the appropriate writer for the requesting device. 但是，如果你创建的自定义文本编写器，或者你想要指定特定的编写器来呈现特定设备的某页，你必须将编写器映射到中的页`controlAdapters`的应用程序.browser 文件的部分。However, if you create a custom text writer or if you want to specify a particular writer to render a page for a specific device, you must map the writer to the page in the `controlAdapters` section of the application .browser file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的自定义控件派生自类。The following code example shows how to override the method of a custom control that is derived from the class. 该代码示例说明如何使用各种方法、 属性和字段。The code example illustrates how to use various methods, properties, and fields. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用重载方法如果该属性不是之一值，或如果直到运行时才知道该属性。Use the overload of the method if the attribute is not one of the values, or if the attribute is not known until run time. 实例的任何给定的标记元素，类维护该元素的属性列表。For an instance of any given markup element, the class maintains a list of attributes for that element. 当调用方法时，添加的任何属性方法均会呈现给元素的开始标记。When the method is called, any attributes added by the method are rendered to the opening tag of the element. 然后清除中的属性的列表对象。The list of attributes is then cleared from the object. 用于呈现标记元素的编码模式是，如下所示：The coding pattern for rendering markup elements is as follows: - 使用方法将任何属性添加到元素。Use the method to add any attributes to the element. - 使用 方法。Use the method. - 根据需要使用其他方法来呈现元素的开始和结束标记之间找到的内容。Use other methods as needed to render the content found between the element's opening and closing tags. - 使用 方法。Use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法之前调用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method before calling the method. 该代码调用的两个不同的重载和两个不同重载调用之前方法呈现``元素写入输出流。The code calls two different overloads of and two different overloads of before it calls the method to render a `` element to the output stream. 方法用于定义自定义属性名为`CustomAttribute`和名为的自定义值`CustomAttributeValue`为``此代码将呈现的元素。The method is used to define the custom attribute named `CustomAttribute` and the custom value named `CustomAttributeValue` for the `` element that this code renders. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用重载方法如果该属性不是之一值，或者直到运行的时和编码才知道该属性是否需要。Use the overload of the method if the attribute is not one of the values, or if the attribute is not known until run time and encoding is needed. 实例的任何给定的标记元素，类维护该元素的属性列表。For an instance of any given markup element, the class maintains a list of attributes for that element. 当调用方法时，添加的任何属性方法均会呈现给元素的开始标记。When the method is called, any attributes added by the method are rendered to the opening tag of the element. 然后清除中的属性的列表对象。The list of attributes is then cleared from the object. 使用方法替换`fEncode`设置为`true`，如果属性可能包含引号 （"）、 小于号 (<)，或与号 (&)。Use the method with `fEncode` set to `true`, if the attribute can possibly contain a quotation mark ("), a less than sign (<), or an ampersand (&). 方法调用将对要满足请求的设备的要求的属性进行编码。The method call will encode the attribute to meet the requirements of the requesting device. 你可以设置`fEncode`到`false`，如果你知道，将生成无这些字符，或者如果您知道已经属性进行了编码。You can set `fEncode` to `false`, if you know that none of these characters will be generated, or if you know that the attribute is already encoded. 如果属性类型，则`Style`，不会编码的值即使`fEndode`是`true`。If the attribute type is `Style`, the value won’t be encoded even if `fEndode` is `true`. 确保样式值 CSS 符合，并且不包含恶意代码。Ensure that the style value is CSS-compliant and doesn’t contain malicious code. 用于呈现标记元素的编码模式是，如下所示：The coding pattern for rendering markup elements is as follows: - 使用方法将任何属性添加到元素。Use the method to add any attributes to the element. - 使用 方法。Use the method. - 根据需要使用其他方法来呈现元素的开始和结束标记之间找到的内容。Use other methods as needed to render the content found between the element's opening and closing tags. - 使用 方法。Use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用重载方法来确保名为的自定义特性`myattribute`，并且其值未编码为``元素。The following code example shows how to use the overload of the method to ensure that a custom attribute, named `myattribute`, and its value are not encoded for an `` element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不会写入标记元素的开始标记在右尖括号 (>)。The method does not write the closing angle bracket (>) of the markup element's opening tag. 这就可以将写入标记属性指定给元素的开始标记。This allows the writing of markup attributes to the opening tag of the element. 使用常量，以结束开始标记，在调用时方法。Use the constant to close the opening tag when calling the method. 使用方法替换常量时写入标记的自结束的元素。Use the method with the constant when you write markup elements that are self-closing. 方法使用的自定义服务器控件所不允许标记或特性的映射，并为每个请求相同的方式呈现标记元素。The method is used by custom server controls that do not allow tag or attribute mapping and render markup elements in the same way for each request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示呈现``元素中的哪两种重载调用方法。The following code example demonstrates rendering an `` element in which both overloads of the method are called. 此代码示例使用以下过程：The code example uses the following process: - 调用方法，来呈现元素的开始字符。Calls the method, which renders the opening characters of the element. - 调用重载以将`alt`属性和其值的``元素。Calls the overload, which writes an `alt` attribute and its value to the `` element. - 调用重载来呈现自定义`myattribute`属性，值为`No "encoding" required`，然后将设置`fEncode`到`false`。Calls the overload to render a custom `myattribute` attribute, with a value of `No "encoding" required`, and then sets `fEncode` to `false`. - 关闭该元素的开始标记，然后调用方法来关闭``元素。Closes the opening tag of the element, and then calls the method to close the `` element. 此代码示例将生成以下标记：This code example generates the following markup: `` `` [!code-cpp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/CPP/htmltextwriter.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/CS/htmltextwriter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/VB/htmltextwriter.vb#5)]
